title: Game freezes in champion select and in-game (even after I force close my Pc and rejoin)
body:
So I've just done the last LoL update on my client (haven't played in 5 days so don't know when it was added), and now, I tried to play 2 games.
First game: It completely froze in loading screen. Had to force shut down and had been remaked when rejoined.
Second: crashed 2-3 seconds after joining the game. Tried to reconnect after force shut down and crashed again.
Anyone has that problem too? It may be my computer or it's the game. (Not playing on Mac. Windows 10 on a Dell)

replies.body: It's really strange to hear the game just crashing in the loading screen or after joining the game.  I've hard a similar issue to this, that could be what you're describing.  If you recently updated Windows 10, the xbox game bar has been causing freezing issues for some players.  I suggest disabling the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) just in case and see if that helps!  Also remove any third party programs you have running for league like play.tv.  Let me know if that helps!
Idk if that changed anything but now it's working! Ty alot even if it may have not done anything ;){{champion:268}}

My roommate is playing on a new MSI GE62 2QD Apache Pro and has this EXACT PROBLEM.
At first we thought it was because she had discord running at the same time. But after trying without discord the same issue occurs. She has no other major background processes outside of Bitdefender running at the same time. Her computer (which has more than ample processing power and RAM)** FREEZES **during the loading screen or shortly after loading into a match on Summoners Rift.

I just ran a DxDiag for her in case any of it matters...
